alert.note: Alert for Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 10:39PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Reno, northwestern Sedgwick, Harvey, Kingman and central Marion Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1039 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Durham to 6 miles southwest of Moundridge to 7 miles west of Kingman. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newton, Hesston, Kingman, Hillsboro, Cheney, Halstead, Marion, North Newton, Sedgwick, Colwich, Haven, Peabody, Garden Plain, Mount Hope, Pretty Prairie, Andale, Goessel, Bentley, Walton, and Lincolnville. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 23 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
